title: Gina Tracker, FBI
description: The perp won’t get away for long when Gina Tracker is on the case. She always finds a way. Also she’s good at tracking.
quote: I’ve never seen a cold trail… except for that time in Glacier National Park in January because of the snow, which is cold.
altHero: Gina Tracker, a Black woman agent wearing a red tracksuit
alt1: Gina kneels in an alley to examine some footprints while a mustached cop talks nearby
alt3: Gina walks toward the mustached cop at a crime scene
